thought: To craft a golden_boots, I need to craft 4 gold_ingot. To craft 4 gold_ingot, I need to smelt 4 gold_ore. To smelt 4 gold_ore, I need to mine 4 gold_ore. To mine 4 gold_ore, I need to move the gold_block from slot 34 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1
